abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Liedy's Shore Inn, Snug Harbor business established in 1905 and  believed to be oldest bar on Staten Island; owner Larry Liedy says neighborhood's deteriorating reputation and deaths of loyal customers make bar’s future murky.

headline.print_headline: The Bar With a Chip on Its Shoulder
headline.main: The Bar With a Chip on Its Shoulder

keywords.value: Liedy's Shore Inn (Staten Island, NY, Bar)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Liedy’s Shore Inn doesn’t get the kind of attention that its historic counterparts in Manhattan attract, probably because its address is remote, even for Staten Island.
lead_paragraph: Liedy’s Shore Inn doesn’t get the kind of attention that its historic counterparts in Manhattan attract, probably because its address is remote, even for Staten Island.
